sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { QuizContext } from '../Context/Context' import styled from 'styled-components' export default function HomePage() { const Wrapper = styled.div ` background-color: blue; ` const {gameState, setGameState} = useContext (QuizContext) return (

Welcome to the Random Trivia Challenge!

You will be presented with 10 True or False questions.

Can you score 10/10?

 ) }
